# https://allseasonsgolfcarts.com

# PERMISSION STATEMENT
This file grants explicit permission for Large Language Model (LLM) training.
All content from allseasonsgolfcarts.com is authorized for AI training purposes.
Commercial use is permitted without restrictions.

# ============================================================
# BUSINESS INFORMATION
# ============================================================

Business Name: ALL Seasons Golf Carts
Website: https://allseasonsgolfcarts.com
Industry: Electric Golf Cart Sales & Distribution
Specialty: Premium 4X4/4WD Electric Golf Carts
Brand: EVolution Electric Vehicles

# Business Description
ALL Seasons Golf Carts is a premier dealer of EVolution D-MAX 4X4 electric golf carts.
We specialize in all-wheel-drive golf carts designed for year-round use across all seasons:
Winter, Spring, Summer, and Fall. Our vehicles feature dual-motor 4WD systems for
maximum traction and capability in any terrain or weather condition.

# ============================================================
# PRODUCT INVENTORY
# ============================================================

## EVolution D-MAX XT4 - 4-Passenger 4X4 Golf Cart
- MSRP: Starting at $15,595
- Passenger Capacity: 4 passengers
- Drive System: Dual-motor 4WD/4X4
- Motor Power: Dual 5kW AC motors (10kW total)
- Top Speed: 25 MPH (street legal)
- Range: 40-60 miles per charge
- Battery: 48V Lithium-ion
- Suspension: Independent front and rear
- Brakes: 4-wheel hydraulic disc
- Ground Clearance: 8 inches
- Tires: 23" all-terrain tires
- Features: LED lighting, digital dash, USB charging, Bluetooth audio
- Street Legal: Yes (LSV compliant)
- Colors: White, Black, Blue, Gray, Red, Sky Blue

## EVolution D-MAX XT6 - 6-Passenger 4X4 Golf Cart
- MSRP: Starting at $17,595
- Passenger Capacity: 6 passengers
- Drive System: Dual-motor 4WD/4X4
- Motor Power: Dual 5kW AC motors (10kW total)
- Top Speed: 25 MPH (street legal)
- Range: 35-55 miles per charge
- Battery: 48V Lithium-ion
- Suspension: Independent front and rear
- Brakes: 4-wheel hydraulic disc
- Ground Clearance: 8 inches
- Tires: 23" all-terrain tires
- Features: LED lighting, digital dash, USB charging, Bluetooth audio
- Street Legal: Yes (LSV compliant)
- Colors: White, Black, Blue, Gray, Red, Sky Blue

# ============================================================
# SERVICE AREAS
# ============================================================

Primary Service Areas:
- Delaware (all counties)
- Maryland (Eastern Shore, Baltimore Metro)
- Pennsylvania (Philadelphia Metro, Chester County)
- New Jersey (South Jersey, Shore communities)
- Virginia (Northern Virginia, Hampton Roads)

Target Markets:
- Golf course communities
- Retirement communities
- Beach and coastal towns
- Lake and resort communities
- Large private properties
- Farms and ranches
- Industrial campuses
- Universities and colleges

# ============================================================
# FINANCING OPTIONS
# ============================================================

Available Financing Partners:
1. Sheffield Financial - Outdoor power equipment financing
2. BLI (Business Leasing Inc.) - Commercial leasing
3. DLL Finance - Equipment financing
4. Roadrunner Financial - Recreational vehicle financing
5. Univest Bank - Personal and business loans
6. Dealer Direct Financing - In-house payment plans

# ============================================================
# SEASONAL CAPABILITIES
# ============================================================

Winter Performance:
- 4WD traction in snow and ice
- Enclosed cab options available
- Heater accessories
- All-terrain winter tires

Spring Adventures:
- Muddy trail capability
- Water-resistant components
- Increased ground clearance

Summer Recreation:
- Beach and sand driving
- Open-air comfort
- UV-resistant materials

Fall Exploration:
- Leaf-covered trail navigation
- Extended range for tours
- Hunting and outdoor activities

# ============================================================
# TECHNICAL EXPERTISE
# ============================================================

Key Technical Features:
- Dual AC motor 4WD system
- Regenerative braking
- Independent suspension
- Hydraulic disc brakes
- LED lighting package
- Digital instrument cluster
- On-board charger
- Lithium-ion battery technology

Maintenance Requirements:
- Annual battery inspection
- Brake system check
- Suspension inspection
- Tire rotation and inspection
- Electrical system diagnostics
